examples.name: available-intime
examples.description: This example shows how to style a node that will be present in the future, by coloring it red.
author: itsasbreuk

examples.name: available-timedout
examples.description: This example waits for a Node to be present within 3 seconds and will throw a timeout-error instead of coloring it red.
author: itsasbreuk

examples.name: unavailable
examples.description: This example removes a node after 3 seconds. Using Y.Node.unavailablePromise(), we have a promise that gets fulfilled and alerts a message.
author: itsasbreuk

examples.name: fireavailabilities
examples.displayName: Listening for Nodes becoming available multiple times
examples.description: This example shows how we can make use of the availableagain- and unavailableagain-events. When the node gets inserted or removed, the events are fired.
author: itsasbreuk
